Capricorn-Capricorn Compatibility 
A Capricorn person is always reliable, trustworthy, dependable and possesses strong perseverance. They stick to the idiom "Slow and steady wins the race" and put in their efforts to reach their goal. Capricornians are too sensitive and they do not express themselves and their feelings easily. They are very energetic and are never lethargic. Capricornians are loyal to their soul mates and hope the same from them. By nature they are sportive. 

Capricorn Man and Capricorn Woman 
The compatibility works well between Capricorn and Capricorn as both belong to the same Zodiac sign. They have high ambitions in life and burn their fats to accomplish their goals. They are never carried away by emotions and show pragmatic approach towards life. They will make a good relationship and their compatibility shows greater chances of success. Their frolic nature may fill their lives with amusement. The compatibility is good for this love match as both Capricorn man and Capricorn woman show earnestness in their relationship. This pair likes to live in the practical world, strive hard to fulfill their paramount aim in life. Capricorn man and Capricorn woman will remain loyal to each other and show consistency in their relationship.
